data.actual_result: The target gets "deleted" from the list of somethings/someones to share with
data.expected_result: The target won't get off the list of someone/something to share with
data.short_description: When choosing target in new Discord share feature and tilting the device, the target would get unchecked
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your gallery - press hold an image - Share to Discord - Choose target to share with - Tilt your device
